CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Taking into account the fact that both IDT and NT are comparatively rigid coplanar structures along the polymer backbone , the IDT-NT based polymers may suffer solubility issue since the tetraoctylbenzene groups attached to the carbon bridges of IDT unit would not be enough to guarantee their solubility in common organic solvents.

Let's think step by step.

1. IDT: Iodine-doped Thiophene (IDT) is a material name. It is a type of polymer with iodine-doped thiophene units as its building blocks.
2. NT: Nitrogen-containing Thiophene (NT) is also a material name. It is a type of polymer with nitrogen-containing thiophene units as its building blocks.
3. Tetraoctylbenzene: This is a material name mentioned in the context of IDT. It refers to the tetraoctylbenzene groups attached to the carbon bridges of the IDT unit.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. IDT (Iodine-doped Thiophene)
2. NT (Nitrogen-containing Thiophene)
3. Tetraoctylbenzene (attached to IDT unit)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| IDT (Iodine-doped Thiophene) |
| NT (Nitrogen-containing Thiophene) |
| Tetraoctylbenzene (attached to IDT unit) |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Taking into account the fact that both IDT and NT are comparatively rigid coplanar structures along the polymer backbone , the IDT-NT based polymers may suffer solubility issue since the tetraoctylbenzene groups attached to the carbon bridges of IDT unit would not be enough to guarantee their solubility in common organic solvents.

Let's think step by step.

1. IDT: Ion-Dipole-Dipole (IDT)
2. NT: Nitrothiophene (NT)
3. carbon bridges: bonds connecting IDT units to each other
4. tetraoctylbenzene groups: organic side groups attached to the IDT units.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. IDT: Ion-Dipole-Dipole (material)
2. solubility: property of IDT-NT based polymers.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| solubility (of IDT-NT based polymers) |
| IDT (Ion-Dipole-Dipole) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Taking into account the fact that both IDT and NT are comparatively rigid coplanar structures along the polymer backbone , the IDT-NT based polymers may suffer solubility issue since the tetraoctylbenzene groups attached to the carbon bridges of IDT unit would not be enough to guarantee their solubility in common organic solvents.

Let's think step by step.

1. IDT: This is a type of polymer, specifically an IDT-NT based polymer.
2. NT: This is also a type of polymer, and it is mentioned in relation to IDT.
3. Fact: This is a piece of information that is being taken into account.
4. Comparatively rigid coplanar structures: This describes the structure of IDT and NT.
5. Polymer backbone: This refers to the main chain of the polymer.
6. Solubility issue: This is a potential problem with IDT-NT based polymers.
7. Tetraoctylbenzene groups: These are chemical groups attached to the IDT unit.
8. Carbon bridges: These are chemical structures in the IDT unit.
9. Common organic solvents: These are types of solvents that IDT-NT based polymers may have difficulty dissolving in.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. IDT-NT based polymers
2. Solubility issue
3. Common organic solvents

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material properties or values. The other entities in the paragraph describe the context or background information related to the material properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| IDT-NT based polymers |
